attributes.action: ban ai video/ photo usage in the uk (not including ai chat apps)
attributes.additional_details: i want the government to ban it because it has been used for sinister things such as undressing woman and children online, also because of the climate and the amount of water it has been using, this is our world we are destroying, future generations are going to have to clean up the mess we made and deal with the consequences that come with cilmate change.
attributes.background: i want to ban ai photo/ video usage within the uk (not including ai chats)

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban the use of AI for image, video and audio creation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751635
